urls.title: Restricted and prohibited | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Check out what types of items are prohibited for safety or have restrictions so that you can take on your trip.

data.text: @dubbleAtrain Hello, Liquids, gels, are not allowed to be transported in the carry on bag. You can get more information at the following link https://t.co/M6Fh8jawfX Kind regards.
@julianatt26 ¿Acaso #LatamLover, Juls? ✈️ 💙 ❤️

We're almost there 😄! Soon you will learn more about San Pedro de Atacama, Pipa, Cartagena, Galapagos, and Cusco, along with our safety video 🎬. Watch it on February 7th on our LATAM Airlines channels and be amazed at the fantastic spots in our region ❤️. #LATAMSafetyVideo ✈️ https://t.co/l3nHlCA0un
@kriegz4 Hola, bríndanos más detalles por DM junto a tu código de reserva y nombre completo. Quedamos atentos.
@maddie5218 Hi, we have sent a request via DM. Regards.
@MCody719 Please note this number is not enabled to receive calls and the attention is provided in English, Spanish or Portuguese. Regards.

@MCody719 Hi, in order to assist you, we ask you to please get in touch with our specialized luggage area via WhatsApp: https://t.co/39UZ8qWcx1. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and be assured that we'll do all possible to assist you through this situation. Regards.
@abbykm98 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@isc991 In this case, please provide us with your case number in order to take a look on it. Best regards.

@isc991 Hello, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience with our in the following link: https://t.co/xrIMfMB2wm, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@JuamMorera Gracias por tu contacto. Saludos.

@LoidesMello Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

Saludos.

@Luis_Fierro_C Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please send us in our DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@valeliese We've sent you a DM. Kind regards.
@RobtWrenGordon Hello, by DM please provide us with your ticket number, cases numbers, along the full name of the passenger. Best regards.
@Luis_Fierro_C Hello Luis, let us know to our DM if you have a specific request in order to help you. Best regards.
@valeliese Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@Franklims2008 by this means we cannot assure you that said information will be handled differently at the airport. If you wish on the day of your flight you can show this screenshot, and take into account meeting all the requirements for entering the destination country to avoid unforeseen.

data.text: @briandyches Hi, our apologies for the response time, we are currently presenting a higher than normal volume of calls. Likewise, please send us via DM your doubts and concers to assist you by this channel. Kind regards.
@obrador1234 Hi, please send us via DM your refund request number to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Hi, we have responded to your request via DM. Regards.

@abbykm98 Hi, our apologies for the response time, we are currently presenting a higher than normal volume of requests. Please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@CLE_CJ Hello. We apologize for the delayed response. Please provide us with the following information via DM. Your full name, email, passport number and country of issuance, phone number and a photo of the charged on your credit card. We'll stay tuned.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @Franklims2008 Hello, we apologize for the response time, depending on the vaccination status of passengers, they must meet following requirements: https://t.co/r7IEA1q4oC by selecting origin - destination. Regards.
@leticiaispretty it is only available at the airport and also on our website here: https://t.co/EHDJBrfZEr Regards.

urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Estados Unidos.

data.text: @DrCardenasCL Hola, es correcto el tipo de prueba aceptado puede ser: Antígeno, NAAT, RT- LAMP, RT- PCR o TMA como esta publicado aquí: https://t.co/bnegdbL9MP. Saludos.

@hungarianhc Hi, we apologize for the response time, in order to assist you, please send us by private message the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply. We will stay tuned.
@Patocoh We have replied to you via DM. Greetings.
@Infante_Javier Hola, informarte que te hemos enviado un DM. Saludos.
@Infante_Javier Hola, en un DM envíanos tu código de reserva por favor.

@leticiaispretty Hi, we apologize for the response time, the price for luggage depends on the moment of the purchase (if is 48 hours before the flight departure or less), you can check the price in our website https://t.co/odo4FBrKTR entering with your reservation code and last name. Regards.
@caritoabulafia Comprendemos tu molestia, esperamos brindarte respuesta lo antes posible. Saludos.

@caritoabulafia Hola, para nosotros es importante la resolución de tu requerimiento, solicitamos a nuestro equipo te notifique la respuesta en el menor tiempo posible. Hemos registramos tus comentarios en el caso, pidiendo que sé de manejo oportuno a esta solicitud.  Saludos.
@cavellucci Hi, please send us via DM your doubts and concerns to assist you. Regards.

@Incredible_YB Hello, we apologize for the response time. You should know that the airplane mode option allows you to access our wifi without any problem. We also invite you to validate the options with the airport staff regarding mobile connections. Regards.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Due to the flight cancellations that have occurred this month, we invite you to follow the recommendations given by Amalia Quiroz, Head of Contingency Customer Care. Get to know your reservation options at https://t.co/8mELGOdjk6 https://t.co/737Gg8L6Yd

@anirudh_pc Hi, our apologies for the response time, we are currently presenting a higher than normal volume of requests. We recommend you to get in touch with the local authorities of your final destination to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

data.text: @acuarianacl Hola, la información sobre restricciones asociadas a la pandemia, la podrás ver en el siguiente enlace: https://t.co/zlTeDwkBtV. Allí también podrás ver si se solicitan requisitos en el país de conexión dependiendo de las horas que esperas en ese aeropuerto. Saludos.

data.text: @carolarrain Hi, due to the increase in contact by omicron, our operation was affected. For that reason, we are only attending to urgent cases of passengers traveling in the next 7 days. We invite you to visit our website where you can process your purchase. Regards.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Along with Rafael Walker, LATAM’s Customer Care Director, we kindly ask you to follow these recommendations if your trip has been affected by flight cancellations. Check out your options at https://t.co/v7eCZL04Bi https://t.co/LWCzwL0Ml3
@meanjoelgreen Hello, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@evangoldschmidt Hi, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We would suggest for you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer. If it doesn't work, you can try using a different browser. Regards.
